start.text: Sorry, I'm not much for conversation...

choices.text: You don't like to conversate yet you came to a party?

frog_not_a_partier.text: Oh, I'm not much for parties. I'm here more so as a protest.

choices.text: A protest? What are you protesting.
You don't seem to be protesting much standing out here by yourself.

frog_protest.text: Oh, you know, bad policies and what not. This event brings in a lot of unique people.

nervous_protest_explain.text: Oh, uhm, well, I'm really here as kind of, like, a protest.

choices.text: You came to a party alone to protest to no one?

berate_the_frog.text: Well... I don't know, it's hard to explain.

choices.text: You're sorry that you can't explain what you're protesting at a party alone?

frog_berating_to_come_clean.text: Look, I'm here for the mayor. Now please, leave me alone...

apprehensive.text: I'm here for the mayor. Please just leave me alone...
